title:
Gauge-invariant scalar and vector operators in the
  $SU\left(2\right)\times U\left(1\right)$ Higgs model: Ward identities and
  renormalization
abstract:
In this work, we investigate the renormalization of the gauge-invariant
composite operators proposed in \cite{Dudal:2023jsu} to describe the
$SU(2)\times U(1)$ Higgs model from a gauge-invariant perspective. To establish
the relationship between the counterterms, we use the Algebraic Renormalization
approach \cite{Piguet:1995er}. Therefore, we also derive the set of Ward
identities of the model after introducing these composite operators. Using
these Ward identities, we demonstrate important exact relations between the
correlation functions of elementary fields and composite fields.
